ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Collecting Bone Chips
ygData.msgSnippet: You know, I found this place in South Karana, a wizard tele tower, that has like 10 skells sitting in front of it....looked like a prime place to farm.
ygData.messageBody:
You know, I found this place in South Karana, a wizard tele tower, that has like 10 skells sitting in front of it....looked like a prime place to farm.
 
Dethmonger, Test
----- Original Message -----
From: Aazen1@...
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, April 09, 2000 4:37 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Collecting Bone Chips

I have a question that I think will benefit every single person on this list.
As you all know, once our supply of bone chips runs low, we then often times
have to spend a large amount of platinum buying a fresh supply from younger
players or spend several hours gathering them ourselves. In the hopes of
making this burden easier on all of us, I come asking : Where do you go to
collect your chips? I ask that anyone who knows of a good place to go when
seeking bone chips shares it with this list. Any and all replies are
appreciated.

Walk in Darkness,
Aazen Sy'Vex

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------
"What about love?"
"Overrated. Biochemically, no different than consuming mass quantities of
chocolate."
-The Devil's Advocate
